import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get custom field values for user"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/custom-fields/values/for/user/{userId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves all custom field values set for a specific user.

**Prerequisites**:
- Obtain the `UserId` from [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users) or [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/users/search-users)

**Workflow Example**:
1. Search for the user: [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users) to find the user and extract `Items[0].UserId`
2. Get custom field values: [GET /api/v1.0/custom-fields/values/for/user/\{userId\}](/docs/api/custom-fields/get-custom-field-values-for-user)
3. The response includes all custom field values currently set on the user

**Minimal Required Fields**: userId path parameter

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"userId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the user to retrieve custom field values for","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
